main event: A report of a UFO sighting involving a formation of 8-10 bright starlike objects near Middletown, New York during the summer of 1963.
interesting points: The objects were observed moving in a formation like a carpet of stars,The witness described seeing a huge mother ship that was larger than the stars,The formation remained spaced for about 2 minutes before darting out of sight at high speed,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds,The report references additional correspondence with the USAF regarding the observation.
sighted object: bright starlike objects and a large mother ship
witness description: The witness described the objects as being about the size of a pin head, darting in different directions.
